bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Pathological Condition identical with dian kuang 癲狂 , peak-illness and madness. Qian jin bei ji fang 千金備急方 14: 其有 種種形相，示表癲邪之端，而見其病，或有默默而不聲，或復多言而漫 說 , “It takes many different forms as a sign of the beginning of peak-illness evil . When the disease becomes manifest, in some cases [patients] are silent and do not use their voice; in other cases they speak again and again and their language is unrestrained”.
